Hi I am

Mellow

White

View Portfolio Download Resume A product designer, specialize in creating magical visual identities for digital products.

What I do

Digital Product Design Services I Offer

Brand Strategy

A strong brand strategy defines what a brand stands for, promises to its customers, and how it communicates those promises through product development. Brand PostureConsumer BehavioursNarrative StrategyOffer Framework

Product Design

The process of creating and developing a product with the goal of solving a specific problem or fulfilling a user need involves a functionality, aesthetics and usability. Web PlatformMobile ApplicationCreative Design SolutionsAI Consulting

UI UX Design

Creating digital products that are both visually appealing and easy to use having focuse on different aspects of the user’s interaction with a product. Visual DesignCustomer ExperiencePrototypingWireframesWeb Design

SEO Services

Aim to increase organic (non-paid) traffic by optimizing various elements of a website, making it more attractive to both users and search engines. PPC AdvertisingSEO AuditsOff-page seoKeyword ResearchLink building

About Me

A product designer with a knack for turning problems and challenges into user-driven strategic solutions.

Get in Touch

hello@example.com

I specialize in creating unique visual identities for digital products. I believe that a stunning design starts with common values, open communication, technical knowledge and respect for your audience.

How I work

Product Design Process

Structured series of steps that guide the development of a new product—from identifying a problem or opportunity, to delivering a final, market-ready solution.

1. Discover
The goal is to define clear objectives and requirements for the product and gathering insights. Stakeholder InterviewProblem FindingMarket ResearchProduct PositioningUX Research
2. Design
In this stage, ideas are translated into tangible concepts to align product with business goals. WireframeVisual DesignUser TestingValidation
3. Deliver
The final phase involves collaborating with developers to build and launch the product. Project HandoverDeveloperr CollaborationLOng TIme Support

item.title: Essential social media tips for small business
item.dc:creator: Taine Noble
item.content:encoded:
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

How you are going to use a passage of lorem ipsum?

Brand design is the answer.

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley.

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

The dumbest mistake is viewing design as something you do at the end of the process to ‘tidy up’ the mess, as opposed to understanding it’s a ‘day one’ issue and part of everything.

Tom Peterson

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

All the Lorem ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate lorem ipsum which looks reasonable.

 Lorem ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of lorem ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

item.title: The value proposition business branding
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

How you are going to use a passage of lorem ipsum?

Brand design is the answer.

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley.

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

The dumbest mistake is viewing design as something you do at the end of the process to ‘tidy up’ the mess, as opposed to understanding it’s a ‘day one’ issue and part of everything.

Tom Peterson

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

All the Lorem ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate lorem ipsum which looks reasonable.

 Lorem ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of lorem ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

item.title: 15 design tips that always deliver growth
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

How you are going to use a passage of lorem ipsum?

Brand design is the answer.

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley.

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

The dumbest mistake is viewing design as something you do at the end of the process to ‘tidy up’ the mess, as opposed to understanding it’s a ‘day one’ issue and part of everything.

Tom Peterson

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

All the Lorem ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate lorem ipsum which looks reasonable.

 Lorem ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of lorem ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

The dumbest mistake is viewing design as something you do at the end of the process to ‘tidy up’ the mess, as opposed to understanding it’s a ‘day one’ issue and part of everything.

Tom Peterson

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

All the Lorem ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate lorem ipsum which looks reasonable.

 Lorem ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of lorem ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

  • Art Direction

Credits

There are many variations of passages of lorem ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of lorem ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the lorem ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using lorem ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What I do

Digital Product Design Services I Offer

Brand Strategy

A strong brand strategy defines what a brand stands for, promises to its customers, and how it communicates those promises through product development. Brand PostureConsumer BehavioursNarrative StrategyOffer Framework

Product Design

The process of creating and developing a product with the goal of solving a specific problem or fulfilling a user need involves a functionality, aesthetics and usability. Web PlatformMobile ApplicationCreative Design SolutionsAI Consulting

UI UX Design

Creating digital products that are both visually appealing and easy to use having focuse on different aspects of the user’s interaction with a product. Visual DesignCustomer ExperiencePrototypingWireframesWeb Design

SEO Services

Aim to increase organic (non-paid) traffic by optimizing various elements of a website, making it more attractive to both users and search engines. PPC AdvertisingSEO AuditsOff-page seoKeyword ResearchLink building

How I work

Product Design Process

Structured series of steps that guide the development of a new product—from identifying a problem or opportunity, to delivering a final, market-ready solution.

1. Discover
The goal is to define clear objectives and requirements for the product and gathering insights. Stakeholder InterviewProblem FindingMarket ResearchProduct PositioningUX Research
2. Design
In this stage, ideas are translated into tangible concepts to align product with business goals. WireframeVisual DesignUser TestingValidation
3. Deliver
The final phase involves collaborating with developers to build and launch the product. Project HandoverDeveloperr CollaborationLOng TIme Support

Testimonials

What clients say

“Extremely professional, unique and enjoyable. The effort taken to ensure sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore voluptat relevance to our requirements ensured the optimum outcome.”

Mark Robinson

Project Manager, ACME Works

“Extremely professional, unique and enjoyable. The effort taken to ensure sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore voluptat relevance to our requirements ensured the optimum outcome.”

Thomas Luze

Senior Product Developer @ ThisOne

“Extremely professional, unique and enjoyable. The effort taken to ensure sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore voluptat relevance to our requirements ensured the optimum outcome.”

Andrea De Santis

CEO, Agresar Soft Inc.

Tools

The key design and development tools I use

Figma

Illustrator

Framer

HTML5

Sketch

Notion

Webflow

Slack

Development

item.title: Brand Strategy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Brand strategy is essentially the long-term plan for the development and positioning of a brand in the market.

Visual design is the practice of creating and arranging visual elements.

 It encompasses a variety of design fields such as graphic design, web design, and branding. The goal of visual design is to enhance the user experience by presenting information.

  • Positioning & Values
  • Brand Voice & Messaging
  • Visual Identity

What makes brand strategy unique:

Brand Posture

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Consumer Behaviours

item.title: Product Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Product design is essentially the long-term plan for the development and positioning of a brand in the market.

Visual design is the practice of creating and arranging visual elements.

 It encompasses a variety of design fields such as graphic design, web design, and branding. The goal of visual design is to enhance the user experience by presenting information.

  • Positioning & Values
  • Brand Voice & Messaging
  • Visual Identity

What makes brand strategy unique:

Brand Posture

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Consumer Behaviours

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Narrative Strategy

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Offer Framework

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Let's talk about your project
Book A Call

Tools

The key design and development tools I use

Figma

Framer

HTML5

Sketch

Notion

Webflow

Development

item.title: UI UX Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
UI UX Design is essentially the long-term plan for the development and positioning of a brand in the market.

Visual design is the practice of creating and arranging visual elements.

 It encompasses a variety of design fields such as graphic design, web design, and branding. The goal of visual design is to enhance the user experience by presenting information.

  • Positioning & Values
  • Brand Voice & Messaging
  • Visual Identity

What makes brand strategy unique:

Brand Posture

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Narrative Strategy

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Offer Framework

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Let's talk about your project
Book A Call

Tools

The key design and development tools I use

Development

item.title: SEO Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
SEO strategy is essentially the long-term plan for the development and positioning of a brand in the market.

Visual design is the practice of creating and arranging visual elements.

 It encompasses a variety of design fields such as graphic design, web design, and branding. The goal of visual design is to enhance the user experience by presenting information.

  • Positioning & Values
  • Brand Voice & Messaging
  • Visual Identity

What makes brand strategy unique:

Brand Posture

Narrative Strategy

Offer Framework

item.title: About Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About Me

A product designer with a knack for turning problems and challenges into user-driven strategic solutions.


Get in Touch

hello@example.com

I specialize in creating unique visual identities for digital products. I believe that a stunning design starts with common values, open communication, technical knowledge and respect for your audience.

Experience

Aug 2023 — Present

Associate Creative Director

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit sed do eiusmod.

⚞ ACME Digital.

May 2021 — Jun 2023

Senior Product Designer

Mar 2020 — Apr 2021

Creative Head @Provev Innovations

Jan 2019 — Feb 2020

Design Intern

Education

Nov 2017 — Dec 2019

Cranfield University, UK

DSGN School, UK

Aug 2013 — Oct 2016

Msc in Innovation Design

item.title: Service Single
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Brand strategy is essentially the long-term plan for the development and positioning of a brand in the market.

Visual design is the practice of creating and arranging visual elements.

 It encompasses a variety of design fields such as graphic design, web design, and branding. The goal of visual design is to enhance the user experience by presenting information.

  • Positioning & Values
  • Brand Voice & Messaging
  • Visual Identity

What makes brand strategy unique:

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Contact Me

Let's talk about your project

Let’s embark on creative journey together by shaping a visual narrative of your brand in the crowded digital space.

Book a Call

+ 1 800 23 456 789

Prefer Email Communication
